00003 #ifndef INSTRUCTION_H
00004 #define INSTRUCTION_H
00005 
00006 #include <string>
00007 #include <vector>
00008 #include <stack>
00009 
00010 /*
00011         Design Pattern Used: Composite
00012         Class:Instruction
00013                 used purely as a Composite portion of the Composite Design Pattern
00014                 inherited by InstructionElement and InstructionSet
00015                 Composite allows objects to be treated uniformly.
00016 */
00017 
00018 
00019 
00020 namespace BabelShark
00021 {
00022         class Instruction;
00023         class InstructionTree;
00024 
00025         typedef std::vector<Instruction*> InstructionCollection;
00026 
00027         class Instruction
00028         {
00029                 public:
00030                         Instruction(unsigned int size, char* name);
00031                         virtual ~Instruction();
00032 
00033                         //virtual function, base definition does nothing.
00034                         //should be implemented by any class inheriting from it.
00035                         virtual void Interpret(char* buffer);
00036 
00037                         //virtual function, base definition does nothing.
00038                         //will be used to Display data to the WireShark output
00039                         virtual char* Display();
00040 
00041                         //virtual function, no implementation in base class
00042                         //used in the InstructionList class.
00043                         virtual Instruction* GetChild();
00044 
00045                         //virtual function, implementation does nothing.
00046                         //used in the InstructionList class.
00047                         virtual void Add(Instruction*);
00048 
00049                         //virtual function, no implementation in base class
00050                         //used in the InstructionList class.
00051                         virtual void Remove(Instruction*);
00052 
00053                         //virtual function, no implementation in base class
00054                         //used in the InstructionList class.
00055                         virtual void CreateIterator();
00056 
00057                         void SetSize(unsigned int size){ _Size = size;}
00058                         void SetName(char* name){ _Name = name;}
00059 
00060                         unsigned int GetSize() { return _Size;}
00061                         char* GetName(){ return (char*)(_Name.c_str());}
00062                         unsigned int GetSizeInBytes(){return _SizeInBytes;}
00063 
00064                         InstructionCollection::iterator GetIterator();
00065 
00066                 protected:
00067                         unsigned int _Size;
00068                         unsigned int _SizeInBytes;
00069                         std::string _Name;
00070                         //Iterator has not been implemented yet.  When it is
00071                         //this is to be used to construct the different
00072                         //Iterator objects in InstructionElement and InstructionSet classes
00073                         //Iterator* _Iter;
00074 
00075                 private:
00076         };
00077 
00078                 class InstructionTree
00079         {
00080                 public:
00081                         InstructionTree(Instruction* root);
00082 
00083                         ~InstructionTree();
00084 
00085                         virtual void First(){ }
00086 
00087                         virtual Instruction* CurrentItem(){return 0;} 
00088 
00089                         virtual void Next(){ }
00090 
00091                         virtual bool IsDone(){return true;}
00092 
00093 
00094                 protected:
00095                         Instruction* _root;
00096                         std::stack<InstructionCollection::iterator> _iterators;
00097         
00098                 private:
00099 
00100 
00101         };
00102 
00103 
00104 
00105 }

00110 #endif //INSTRUCTION_H
